explains: v. 搭档主持，联合主办

sentences.en: She is also a co-host of The Fashion Show.
sentences.cn: 她也是一家时尚秀的合作主持人。

sentences.en: Next to me, my co-host for today, the lovely Liu Xin.
sentences.cn: 站在我旁边的，我今天的搭档，可爱的刘欣。

sentences.en: Mr.Franco simply tackles all the offenders, including his co-host.
sentences.cn: 弗兰科先生负责打击所有的捣乱分子，包括他的搭档。
